page.title: 01Racing Pigeons
page.content: MY DAD RACES PIGEONS. BEFORE THEY GO INTO A RACE THEY HAVE TO BE SPRAYED WITH SPECIAL CHEMICALS. WHEN THE BASKETS HAVE BEEN SPRAYED AND PRECLEANED, THE PIGEONS ARE PUT INTO THEM. THEY ARE TAKEN TO A PIGEON CLUB, WHERE THEY HAVE RINGS PUT ROUND THEIR LEGS. THE PIGEON OFFICERS WRITE THE NUMBERS DOWN IN A BOOK. THE PIGEONS ARE TAKEN TO WHERE THEY'RE RACING FROM AND LET OUT. WE HAVE A SPECIAL CLOCK WHICH TIMES THEM. WHEN THEY GET BACK TO THE CREE WHICH IS WHAT WE CALL THEIR HOUSE, WE TAKE THE RUBBER RING OFF AND PUT IT IN THE TOP OF THE CLOCK.YOU HAVE TO TURN A KEY AND THE CLOCK SETS A TIME. IF YOU WIN YOUR PRIZE IS A CERTIFICATE AND YOU COULD WIN A LARGE AMOUNT OF MONEY. TO HELP THEM FLY YOU HAVE TO FEED THEM ON A SPECIAL DIET OF PIGEON CORN WITH BEANS, RAPE SEED AND PELLETS A. DUNN.
